name: com.atomjump.medimage
description: This app allows a medical doctor to take a photo with their iPhone or Android phone, and transfer the image securely to their desktop system, which has the MedImage Server installed on it.
author: AtomJump

cordova-plugin-camera.CAMERA_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: AtomJump MedImage would like to access your camera, so that you can take patient photos.
cordova-plugin-camera.PHOTOLIBRARY_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: AtomJump MedImage would like to access your photo library, so that you can see any existing patient photos.

notes: May need to get cordova-plugin-insomnia from git+https://github.com/tombolaltd/cordova-plugin-insomnia.git  ?
